title: Losmen Melati
overview: Starting from the intriguing ending of the film version, this series delves deeper into the terrifying secrets within this enigmatic inn. When guests arrive to witness the peculiar and mysterious Melati Inn, its owner, Madam Melati, has her own plans for the souls entering her cursed motel. Amidst the rising fear, we soon uncover Melati's secret, her history of torment, and her connection to this inn.
